thread.title: ‘Lost’ since the ’80s, ‘Twice Upon a Time’ gets 2nd time around
thread.title_full: ‘Lost’ since the ’80s, ‘Twice Upon a Time’ gets 2nd time around - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Pam Grady
title: ‘Lost’ since the ’80s, ‘Twice Upon a Time’ gets 2nd time around
text:
Photo: 1996-98 AccuSoft Inc., All Right, Courtesy Warner Bros. Home Enter Synonamess Botch, evil ruler of the Murkworks and hatcher of a plan to bring on nonstop nightmares to the Rushers in city of Din, in the animated fantasy "Twice Upon a Time." The 1983 feature, directed by John Korty and Charles Swenson, premieres on DVD on Tuesday, September 29. Credit: Courtesy Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Synonamess Botch, evil ruler of the Murkworks and hatcher of a plan...
These days Harley Jessup is a production designer at Pixar, where his projects have included “Monsters Inc.” and “Ratatouille.” He is also an Oscar winner for his visual effects work on “Innerspace.” Synonamess Botch, evil ruler of the Murkworks and hatcher of a plan to bring on nonstop nightmares to the Rushers in city of Din, in the animated fantasy "Twice Upon a Time." The 1983 feature, directed by John Korty and Charles Swenson, premieres on DVD on Tuesday, September 29. Credit: Courtesy Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Synonamess Botch, evil ruler of the Murkworks and hatcher of a plan...
These days Harley Jessup is a production designer at Pixar, where his projects have included “Monsters Inc.” and “Ratatouille.” He is also an Oscar winner for his visual effects work on “Innerspace.”
